basics.name: David Ralph
basics.label: Senior Analyst Programmer
basics.summary: I have been a software development professional for over 34 years. I have a strong track record of building, launching and supporting enterprise projects. I am a great team player, and I am passionate about turning customer requirements into useful and usable software.

references.reference: David is a JavaScript/TypeScript developer with a passion for developing quality software quickly. He is a proven team player who is known for his ability to manage a high volume of work with minimal supervision.
references.name: Contact Available Upon Request

highlights: Developed and coded business rules for enterprise applications used by thousands of banking customers including business rules for mortgage applications
Developed and coded a new solution for managing the bank's country and corporate bank accounts on behalf of the firm's corporate clients
work.summary: Innovate and manage the delivery of the firm's top performing applications used by retail and commercial business banking customers

highlights: Developed an e-commerce site for the credit union's members to access their accounts. This site was highly successful and was awarded an Innovation Award by the Canadian Credit Union Association

Developed a mobile application for the credit union's members to access their accounts. This application was highly successful and was awarded an Innovation Award by the Canadian Credit Union Association
work.summary: Innovate and manage the delivery of the credit union's top performing applications used by members and employees
